title: sAmba sadAshivAya
sahitya:
sAmba sadAshivAya namAstE sadAnandAya sOmAskandAya


anupallavi

 shAmbhavI hitAya shashi shEkharAya sadgati pradAya kAmbOja padAya


caraNam   sAdhu janAvanAya shankarAya sad-guruguhAtmajAya varadAya sakalAgama 
sannuta varAya shrIdhara purandarAdi dikpAla sanandanAdi sakala dEva 
nutAya mAdhurya sudhA dhArAya mArkaNDEyAyuSprada nipuNatarAya
